content: want to add strings to close the opening we will make four strings their placement will vary depending on the size 8 alice s wool works of your work see picture 12 for reference and use stitch markers to mark where you want the strings to be placed photo 12 reference for string placements make 4 make a slip knot and join yarn with a tight slip_stitch on the brim of the sleeve chain 25 or more depending on how long you want the ties to be chain 1 and turn working in the back bump of each chain single_crochet in the second chain from your hook continue with single_crochet in each remaining chain finish with another slip_stitch in the same st you joined your yarn into fasten_off weave in all the ends andalldone thank you for choosing this pattern i hope you like your new book pouch feel free to reach out to me on instagram @aliceswoolworks for any questions or recommendations for improvement do not hesitate to post your creations and tag me 9 alice s wool works withgratitudetotesterandtechnicaleditorflutterbyfe @flutterbyfe 10
